# Python String Utils

A small utility library for strings.

- simple and pythonic
- no external dependencies
- fully documented
- PEP8 complaint
- 100% code coverage
- tested against multiple python versions (2.7, 3.2, 3.3, 3.4)

## What's inside...

### String checking functions:

- is_url
- is_email
- is_credit_card
- is_camel_case
- is_snake_case
- is_json
- is_uuid

### String manipulation and generation

- camel_case_to_snake
- snake_case_to_camel
- reverse
- uuid
- shuffle


...and more are coming!


---

Full API documentation available on: <http://python-string-utils.readthedocs.org/en/latest/>
